translated: The great Kashmiri paṇḍita Somanātha and the great Tibetan translator, the monk Sherab Drak, translated, edited, and finalized it.

original: dus phyis yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pas spras pa'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung dang / dpon chen sh'akya bzang po'i gsung bzhin du mkhas pa chen po zhang ston mdo sde dpal dang / dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshul khong du chud pa'i dge slong tshul khrims dar gyis don gyi chal dpyad cing legs par bskul te legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos rig pa'i lo ts'a ba dge slong shong ston gyis /
analyzed: dus phyis yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pas spras pa'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung dang / dpon chen sh'akya bzang po'i gsung bzhin du mkhas pa chen po zhang ston mdo sde dpal dang / dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshul khong du chud pa'i dge slong tshul khrims dar gyis don gyi chal dpyad cing legs par bskul te legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos rig pa'i lo ts'a ba dge slong shong ston gyis /
translated: Later, the great scholar Zhangtön Dodepel, who was endowed with immeasurable excellent qualities, and the monk Tsultrim Dar, who had mastered the system of the Kālacakra, examined the meaning and encouraged me well. The paṇḍit of the Tibetan language, the monk Shönu Gyalchok, who was endowed with the excellent qualities of learning, ethics, and kindness, translated it well with the excellent language of the present day.

original: dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por yul dbus kyi rgya dpe gnyis la gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o //
analyzed: dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por yul dbus kyi rgya dpe gnyis la gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o //
translated: It was corrected and finalized by comparing it with two Indian texts in the great temple of glorious Sakya.

original: gang gi thugs dgongs rnam par dag pa yis //
analyzed: gang gi thugs dgongs rnam par dag pa yis //
translated: By the pure intention of this,🔽may those who have encouraged and provided the conditions for this,

original: 'di la bskul zhing mthun rkyen sgrubs pa dang // bdag gis 'bad las bsod nams gad thob des //
analyzed: 'di la bskul zhing mthun rkyen sgrubs pa dang // bdag gis 'bad las bsod nams gad thob des //
translated: and I, the one who has made the effort,

original: kun gyis 'di rtogs sangs rgyas sar gnas shog //
analyzed: kun gyis 'di rtogs sangs rgyas sar gnas shog //
translated: all attain buddhahood by realizing this.

original: slar yang dpal ldan bla ma dam pa chos kyi rje thams cad mkhyen pa dang / dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo pa chen po dha rma k'i rti shr'i bha dra sa /
analyzed: slar yang dpal ldan bla ma dam pa chos kyi rje thams cad mkhyen pa dang / dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo pa chen po dha rma k'i rti shr'i bha dra sa /
translated: Again, the glorious and sublime guru, the lord of dharma, the omniscient one, and the glorious and great Kālacakra practitioner Dharmakīrtiśrībhadra🔽contemplated the meaning of this well and encouraged me with their words.

original: 'di'i don rnams legs par dgongs shing bka' yis bskul nas de dag gi gsung bzhin du //
analyzed: 'di'i don rnams legs par dgongs shing bka' yis bskul nas de dag gi gsung bzhin du //
translated: In accordance with their statements,

original: pandi ta chen po sthi ra ma ti'i bka' drin las legs par sbyar ba'i tshul rig pa lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong blo gros rgyal mtshan dang / blo gros dpal bzang pos /
analyzed: pandi ta chen po sthi ra ma ti'i bka' drin las legs par sbyar ba'i tshul rig pa lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong blo gros rgyal mtshan dang / blo gros dpal bzang pos /
translated: the method of composition through the kindness of the great paṇḍita Sthiramat, the translator Shakya Śrī Bhadra, and the monk Lodrö Gyaltsen

original: rgyud dang 'grel pa'i rgya dpe mang po la gtugs nas dag pa rnams dang mthun par bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //🔽de ltar gsung rab rgya mtsho'i nges don stong nyid snying rje'i snying po ni //
analyzed: rgyud dang 'grel pa'i rgya dpe mang po la gtugs nas dag pa rnams dang mthun par bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o // de ltar gsung rab rgya mtsho'i nges don stong nyid snying rje'i snying po ni //
translated: Having consulted many Indian texts of the tantra and commentaries, I translated, edited, and finalized the text in accordance with the pure ones.

original: rnam kun mchog ldan stong pa nyid dang 'gyur med mchog gi bde chen du //
analyzed: rnam kun mchog ldan stong pa nyid dang 'gyur med mchog gi bde chen du //
translated: Thus, the definitive meaning of the ocean of scriptures, emptiness endowed with the most sublime of manifestations, and unchanging supreme bliss,

original: legs ston dus kyi 'khor lor 'bad pa'i dge ba gad nges 'gro ba kun //
analyzed: legs ston dus kyi 'khor lor 'bad pa'i dge ba gad nges 'gro ba kun //
translated: is well taught in the Kalachakra. May the virtue of this effort

original: gzhung 'di rtogs shing lam der zhugs nas 'bras bu de nyid myur thob shog /
analyzed: gzhung 'di rtogs shing lam der zhugs nas 'bras bu de nyid myur thob shog /
translated: cause all beings to realize this scripture, enter this path, and swiftly attain its result.
